description: Detects Hurricane Panda Activity Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Hurricane Panda Activity
query: ((process.command_line:*localgroup* AND process.command_line:*admin* AND process.command_line:*\/add*) OR process.command_line:*\\Win64.exe*)
